reviews.snippet:
After a lot of research and examination I ended up choosing this clinic in Turkey and it turned out that I was not wrong in my assumptions, the clinic turned out to be great and the staff are very upstanding and decent people.

Once I had some treatment in Poland, and my experience there was that they tried all the time to find more treatments to sell me in order to make the most money. In Antalya it was the other way around, they adviced me the treatment which was best for me and my situation, not the treatment that would bring them the most profit. A sign of great professionalism, high standards of quality and such a huge green flag for me as a patient and customer! These are people who have earned and deserve my trust.

I am very happy with the finished product, my social life is revived, and I can once again show the people I love just how much they mean to me and how happy I am because I have them in my life.

As is mandatory in my country, I had to take some tests after receiving medical treatment abroad - all the tests came back negative (MRSA, ESBL and VRE (multi-drug resistant bacteria tests)), something which means that the clinic is very clean and healthy for its patients and that receiving treatment there is safe.

Some of my friends are already asking about the clinic, and are considering treaments there themselves after seeing this fantastic result in my smile.

I have absolutely no qualms about recommending the clinic to anyone.

reviews.snippet:
My husband and I probably have the best experience to share! We both came here twice (phase 1 in September 2022 and phase 2 in March 2023)‚Äî my husband had a full-mouth dental implant reconstruction, and I had periodontal flap surgery and 20  ceramic crowns. From day one, we were so touched by how warm, friendly, and professional the whole team was. Everyone ‚Äî from the doctors to the assistants and coordinators ‚Äî made us feel completely comfortable and well cared for.                                                      Their skills and attention to detail are truly amazing. Every step was carefully explained, and you could tell they really cared about doing their best for us, not just finishing the job. We left feeling happy but still a little unsure how long everything would last.

Well, it‚Äôs been almost three years now ‚Äî and we couldn‚Äôt be happier! Six months after our treatment, we went for a check-up with our dentist here in Canada. After taking X-rays, they were honestly shocked at how perfect the work done in Turkey was. Even now, our Canadian dentist still praises the results every time we visit.

We‚Äôre beyond grateful to the entire team for giving us not only beautiful, healthy smiles but also real confidence and peace of mind. Thank you all so much ‚Äî you‚Äôre amazing! üëèüíê

response.snippet: It is a great honor for us to see your wonderful review and happiness almost three years after your treatment. üôèüèª  With our 50 years of experience spanning two generations, it is very important for us that you approve of our mission of creating happy smiles for all our patients with long-term and permanent treatments with your valuable comments. As members of the Adalya family, we look forward to see you and your husband back to our clinic in the future. We extend our love and respect to your entire family.

reviews.snippet: Just got back from Antalya, Turkey where I had Adalya Dental do my full upper implants, and I‚Äôm very happy with them. In the States I was quoted 40k; I flew over, twice and got the whole job done,  and my total with round-trip flights and everything was right under 10 grand. Clinic was clean, everyone spoke very good English, zero pain, teeth feel rock-solid and look completely natural. I  flew halfway around the world for this, and I‚Äôd do it again in a heartbeat. Adalya Dental clinic straight-up gave me my smile back without bankrupting me. 100% worth it.

reviews.snippet:
My dad recently had treatment at Adalya Dentist in Turkey and the whole experience was excellent from start to finish. The team were professional, welcoming, and very attentive throughout the process. Everything was explained clearly, which made him feel completely comfortable and reassured.

The clinic itself was modern and spotless, with high standards of care that exceeded expectations. The staff went out of their way to make sure he was looked after, and the level of service was outstanding.

Most importantly, my dad is absolutely delighted with the results of his treatment. The quality of the work is fantastic and it has given him a renewed confidence in his smile.

We would not hesitate to recommend Adalya Dentist to anyone considering dental treatment in Turkey. A truly positive experience and great value for the excellent standard of care provided.

reviews.snippet: I searched for a long time for a dental clinic in Turkey where I could get crowns for my teeth. I also read reviews and finally decided to go with Adalia Dental Clinic. It was definitely the right choice‚Äîmy teeth look beautiful. The dentists were professional and did their work with great precision and care. The reception was personal and friendly, and their shuttle took me to and from the hotel. I am extremely satisfied and can confidently recommend this place based on my experience.

reviews.snippet: I took my wife to have full implants. You are looked after from the moment you come out of the airport with the transport to the hotel and the dentist. The attention to the patient is second to none. My wife could not be happier with her life changing implants and sends a huge thank you to the whole team.
